If you are a bomb technician or part of a bomb disposal unit, it is crucial to follow your training and standard operating procedures. Handling or disarming bombs requires specialized training and knowledge specific to your organization and jurisdiction. If you are faced with a real bomb scenario, you should follow established protocols and contact your team's resources for assistance.

For professional guidance, you should rely on your training manuals, experienced colleagues, and official channels in your organization. Always prioritize safety and adhere to the protocols designed to keep you and others safe.
